returnValues.name: anchorRef
returnValues.description: Ref to be assigned to the trigger element (e.g., a button).

returnValues.name: popoverRef
returnValues.description: Ref to be assigned to the floating content element.

returnValues.name: isOpen
returnValues.description: Reactive state indicating if the popover is currently visible.

returnValues.name: open
returnValues.description: Function to set isOpen to true.

returnValues.name: close
returnValues.description: Function to set isOpen to false.

returnValues.name: toggle
returnValues.description: Function to flip the current visibility state.
